40typedef struct {
41 nbgl_obj_t *obj;
42 uint8_t token; // user token, attached to callback
43 uint8_t index; // index within the token
44 tune_index_e tuneId; // if not @ref NBGL_NO_TUNE, a tune will be played
45} layoutObj_t;
